QNodeEditor.clipboard package¶

Submodules¶

QNodeEditor.clipboard.clipboard module¶

Class handling clipboard interaction for node scenes

class QNodeEditor.clipboard.clipboard.Clipboard(scene: NodeScene)¶

Bases: object

Class that handles cutting/copying/pasting for node scenes

add_state(state: dict) → None¶

Set a state loaded from the clipboard to the scene :param state: state to add to scene :return: None

copy() → None¶

Store the state of the selected items in the clipboard :return: None

cut() → None¶

Store the state of the selected items in the clipboard and remove them :return: None

get_selected_state(remove_after: bool = False) → dict¶

Get the state of the selected items :param remove_after: whether to remove selected items after reading state :return: dict: selected items state

paste() → None¶

Try pasting items from the clipboard into the scene :return: None

Module contents¶

Module containing clipboard management for node scenes
